alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Taylor; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Franklin; Inland Jefferson; Inland Taylor; Inland Wakulla; Leon; Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 09 at 11:57PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Wakulla, Jefferson, northwestern Taylor, southeastern Leon, northeastern Franklin and central Madison Counties through 1230 AM EST... At 1156 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Monticello to near Woodville to 10 miles northeast of Carrabelle. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Monticello, St. Marks, Madison, Crawfordville, Woodville, Perry, Greenville, Sopchoppy, Cody, Panacea, Drifton, Scanlon, Medart, Natural Bridge, Hampton Springs, Liveoak Island, Curtis Mill, Saint Teresa, Iddo and Moseley Hall. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
